name: Stake (Piccadilly)
description:
Fight off aggressive robots and try to survive as long as you can in this 2D survival action shooter! Defend yourself against waves of various robots, collecting power-ups and boosts along the way. Watch out for extra tough enemies at higher waves!

Stake is a 2D game that puts an emphasis on survival and action, content includes;   

  •  Various weapons with different attributes.
  • Normal and hardmode.    
  • The game will get slightler harder the more you play.
